Description: A U.S. district court has ruled that LeadClick Media, an affiliate marketing network, and its parent company, CoreLogic, Inc., must turn over $11.9 million in ill-gotten gains they received from a deceptive marketing scheme that sold purported weight-loss products.

Private Litigation Case Title: Tyrone Henderson, et al. v. Corelogic National Background Data, LLC
Harriett Mitchell v. Corelogic, Inc. et al
